title: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Meanwhile, in a large bowl, beat the eggs, Pecorino Romano cheese, and Parmesan cheese.
In a large skillet, cook the bacon over medium heat until crispy.
Add the garlic to the skillet and cook until fragrant.
Drain the spaghetti and add it to the skillet with the bacon and garlic.
Remove the skillet from the heat and add the egg and cheese mixture to the spaghetti.
Toss the spaghetti until well combined and the egg mixture is heated through.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve hot and enjoy!

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: 1 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a large bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth.
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla extract.
Gradually mix in the flour mixture until just combined.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, or until golden.
Allow to cool on the baking sheets for 5 minutes, then transfer to wire racks to cool completely.
Enjoy with a glass of cold milk!

title: Chicken Alfredo
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cooked and diced
instructions: Cook fettuccine according to package instructions.
In a large saucepan, heat the heavy cream and butter over medium heat until the butter is melted.
Stir in the Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, and dried basil until well combined.
Add the cooked chicken to the saucepan and stir to combine.
Drain the pasta and add it to the saucepan with the sauce.
Toss the pasta until well coated with the sauce.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve hot and enjoy!

title: Beef Stir Fry
ingredients: 1 pound sirloin steak, sliced into thin strips
Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large skillet or wok, heat the vegetable oil over high heat.
Add the beef to the skillet and cook until browned.
Remove the beef from the skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, add the red bell pepper, yellow onion, garlic, broccoli, and snow peas.
Stir fry the vegetables for 3-5 minutes or until tender.
In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, cornstarch, and water.
Add the beef and the soy sauce mixture to the skillet with the vegetables.
Stir until well combined and the sauce has thickened.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve hot and enjoy!

title: Grilled Steak with Chimichurri Sauce
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Season steaks with salt and black pepper.
Grill steaks over high heat until desired doneness is reached.
Meanwhile, in a food processor, pulse together parsley, cilantro, garlic, oregano, red pepper flakes, cumin, salt, red wine vinegar, and olive oil.
Serve steaks with chimichurri sauce on the side.
Enjoy!

title: Pesto Pasta Salad
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Meanwhile, in a food processor, pulse together basil, Parmesan cheese, pine nuts, garlic, salt, pepper, and olive oil.
Drain pasta and transfer to a large bowl.
Add cherry tomatoes, feta cheese, and pesto to the pasta.
Toss to combine.
Chill in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour.
Serve cold and enjoy!
